testcase.purpose: When animation-delay is set to a negative time offset, animation will execute as soon as it is applied but act as if the animation had started the specified time in the past
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-delay is set to a positive time offset, animation will delay execution by the specified offset value
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-delay is set to 0s (zero seconds), animation will execute as soon as it is applied
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-delay applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-delay applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-delay property accepts 'initial' keyword
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-delay property accepts 'inherit' keyword
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-direction is set to alternate, animation cycle will iteration that are odd counts are played in the normal direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a reverse direction
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-direction is set to normal, all iterations of animation are played as specified
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-direction is set to alternate-reverse, the animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the normal direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are Even counts are played in a reverse direction
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-direction is set to reverse, all iterations of the animation are played in the reverse direction from the way they were specified
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-direction applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-direction applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that setting 'display' property to 'none' terminates running animation applied to the element, and updating 'display' property to a value other than 'none' will start the animation
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-duration value is set blank, there will be no animation seen
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-duration is set a finite time offset, animation takes the specifies time to complete one cycle
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-duration is set to a negative value, it is treated as 0s (zero seconds) and no animation is seen
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-duration is set to 0s (zero seconds), animation occurs instantaneously, there will be no animation seen
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-duration is set to 0s (zero seconds), and 'animation-fill-mode' is set to 'forwards', the last frame of the animation will be displayed
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-duration is set to 0s (zero seconds), and 'animation-fill-mode' is set to 'both', the last frame of the animation will be displayed
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-duration applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-duration applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that the event is an instance of AnimationEvent
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that the event inherts from Event
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that Missing type argument
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that type argument is string
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that type argument is null
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that event type set to undefined
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationName has default value of empty string
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that elapsedTime has default value of 0.0
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationName is readonly
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that elapsedTime is readonly
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationEventInit argument is null
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationEventInit argument is undefined
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationEventInit argument is empty dictionary
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationName set to 'sample'
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that elapsedTime set to 0.5
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that AnimationEventInit properties set value
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationstart event is instanceof AnimationEvent
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationend event is instanceof AnimationEvent
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationiteration event is instanceof AnimationEvent
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-fill-mode is set to none, animation has no effect when it is applied but not executing
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-fill-mode is set to forwards, animation will apply the property values for the time the amination ended after the animation ends
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-fill-mode is set to backwards, animation-delay is set a positive time offset, and animation-direction is 'normal' or 'alternate-reverse', animation will apply the from or 0% keyframe That will start the first iteration
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check if animation-fill-mode is set to both, the effects of both 'forwards' and 'backwards' will apply
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-fill-mode applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-fill-mode applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-iteration-count is not set, 1 is taken by default and animation will play from beginning to end once
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-iteration-count is set to infinite, animation will repeat forever
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-iteration-count is set to negative count, it is invalid and animation will play from beginning to end once
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-iteration-count is set to non-integer, animation will end partway through its last cycle
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-iteration-count is set to integer count, animation will repeat the specified number of times
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-iteration-count is set to 0 (zero), no animation is seen
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-iteration-count applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-iteration-count applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationiteration event occurs at the end of each iteration of an animation for which animation-iteration-count is greater than one
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that @keyframes rule accepts 'from' and 'to' keywords, and percentage values
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that a keyframe selector specifies negative percentage values or values higher than 100%, the keyframe will be ignored
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that @keyframes rule accpets 'animation-timing-function' property used as the animation moves to the next keyframe
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-name is set without any value, there will be no animation
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-name is set to refer to a keyframe at-rule that provides the property values for the animation, animation will execute
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-name is set to none, there will be no animation
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-name does not match any keyframe at-rule, there are no properties to be animated and animation will not execute
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-name applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-name applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-play-state is set to paused, animation is paused where the progress it had made before being paused
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-play-state is set to running, animation will proceed as normal
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-play-state applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-play-state applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation shorthand property accepts time values for animation-duration and animation-delay in order
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation shorthand applies to the ::after pseudo element and accepts time values for animation-duration and animation-delay in order
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation shorthand applies to the ::before pseudo element and accepts time values for animation-duration and animation-delay in order
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animationstart event occurs at the start of an animation, animationend event occurs when animation finishes
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-timing-function is set to cubic-bezier with parameters (0,0,1,1), animation will progress over one cycle of its duration with constant speed
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-timing-function is set to ease, animation will starts slow, gain acceleration in the middle and again slow down at the end
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-timing-function is set to ease-in, animation will start slow, gain acceleration as time progresses
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-timing-function is set to ease-in-out, animation will start slow, gain acceleration in the middle and again slow down at the end
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-timing-function is set to ease-out, animation will start with higher (than the normal) speed and relatively slow down as time progresses
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-timing-function is set to linear, animation will progress over one cycle of its duration with constant speed
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-timing-function is set to step-start, animation will play the end effect at the start of the interval
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-timing-function is set to step-end, animation will play the end effect at the end time point, and keep the start effect at the start of the interval
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-timing-function is set to steps with parameters (number, start), animation will be defined by the number that divides the domain of operation into equally size intervals, evey time the change happens at the start of the interval
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: When animation-timing-function is set to steps with parameters (number, end), animation will be defined by the number that divides the domain of operation into equally size intervals, evey time the changes happens at the end of the interval
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-timing-function applies to the ::after pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3

testcase.purpose: Check that animation-timing-function applies to the ::before pseudo element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
